analysis:
Entries in art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last four years. The -80.8% change compared to a change of -75.0% in all AS-Level entries over the last four years. Over the same period, the 17-year-old population has changed by approximately -4.8%.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in art and design subjects in 2018 compared to all AS-Level subjects. A total of 21.8% of pupils achieved A grades in art and design subjects compared to 27.5% for all subjects.

Entries in biology have decreased sharply across the UK over the last four years. The -79.0% change compared to a change of -75.0% in all AS-Level entries over the last four years. Over the same period, the 17-year-old population has changed by approximately -4.8%.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in biology in 2018 compared to all AS-Level subjects. A total of 17.2% of pupils achieved A grades in biology compared to 27.5% for all subjects.
